Chinese Text: 这次数学竞赛太难了，我一道题都解不出来。坐在我旁边的那个女生却轻松写满了整张试卷，提前交卷了。
English Text: The math competition was brutal, and I couldn't solve a single problem. The girl sitting next to me, however, effortlessly filled her entire paper and handed it in early.

Chinese Text: 这次数学竞赛太难了，我一道题都解不出来。坐在我旁边的那个女生也跟我一样咬着笔头，直到最后也没写几个字。
English Text: The math competition was brutal, and I couldn't solve a single problem. The girl sitting next to me was also chewing her pen, barely writing anything until the end.

Chinese Text: 我们同一年进的公司。现在我还只是个初级助理，而他已经连升三级，成了部门总监。
English Text: We joined the company the same year. I'm still just a junior assistant, while he has been promoted three times and is now the department director.

Chinese Text: 我们同一年进的公司。现在我还只是个初级助理，而他也跟我一样，还在做着最基础的杂活。
English Text: We joined the company the same year. I'm still just a junior assistant, and he, like me, is still doing the most basic menial tasks.

Chinese Text: 在才艺展示上，我唱歌跑调了。接着上场的那个男生拥有专业歌手般的嗓音，全场都被他震撼了。
English Text: I sang out of tune during the talent show. The guy who went on next had the voice of a professional singer, and the whole audience was blown away.

Chinese Text: 在才艺展示上，我唱歌跑调了。接着上场的那个男生也紧张得忘词了，场面一度非常尴尬。
English Text: I sang out of tune during the talent show. The guy who went on next also got nervous and forgot his lyrics, making it incredibly awkward.

Chinese Text: 我在努力攒钱买一辆二手车。我的邻居刚把一辆全新的法拉利开进了他家的车库。
English Text: I'm struggling to save up for a used car. My neighbor just drove a brand-new Ferrari into his garage.

Chinese Text: 我在努力攒钱买一辆二手车。我的邻居也还在开着他那辆总是抛锚的旧车。
English Text: I'm struggling to save up for a used car. My neighbor is also still driving his old clunker that breaks down all the time.

Chinese Text: 为了完成这幅画，我熬了一整夜，但看起来还是一团糟。而她只用了半小时随手涂鸦，就画出了一幅杰作。
English Text: I stayed up all night working on this painting, but it still looks like a mess. She, on the other hand, created a masterpiece in just half an hour of casual sketching.

Chinese Text: 为了完成这幅画，我熬了一整夜，但看起来还是一团糟。而她也折腾了一整晚，最后画出来的东西跟我的一样平庸。
English Text: I stayed up all night working on this painting, but it still looks like a mess. She also struggled all night, and what she produced was just as mediocre as mine.

Chinese Text: 聚会上没人理我，我只能躲在角落。而他是整个派对的灵魂人物，所有人都围着他大笑。
English Text: No one talked to me at the party, so I hid in the corner. He, however, was the life of the party, with everyone gathering around him laughing.

Chinese Text: 聚会上没人理我，我只能躲在角落。而他也显得格格不入，一个人孤零零地站在窗边。
English Text: No one talked to me at the party, so I hid in the corner. He also looked out of place, standing all alone by the window.

Chinese Text: 健身房里，我举个空杆都费劲。旁边那个家伙却能轻松卧推两百公斤，肌肉线条完美。
English Text: At the gym, I struggle to even lift the empty bar. The guy next to me, however, is bench-pressing 200kg with ease, showing off perfect muscle definition.

Chinese Text: 健身房里，我举个空杆都费劲。旁边那个家伙也是个新手，跟我一样在与最轻的哑铃搏斗。
English Text: At the gym, I struggle to even lift the empty bar. The guy next to me is also a newbie, struggling with the lightest dumbbells just like I am.

Chinese Text: 我的创业公司刚刚破产了。而我的大学室友刚刚带领他的公司在美国上市，身价过亿。
English Text: My startup just went bankrupt. Meanwhile, my college roommate just took his company public in the US and is now worth over a hundred million.

Chinese Text: 我的创业公司刚刚破产了。而我的大学室友最近也被裁员了，正在焦头烂额地找工作。
English Text: My startup just went bankrupt. Meanwhile, my college roommate was recently laid off and is frantically looking for a job.

Chinese Text: 这篇论文我改了十遍还是被拒稿了。同行的一位学者一投稿就被顶级期刊直接录用。
English Text: I revised this paper ten times and it still got rejected. A scholar in the same field submitted his and got accepted by a top-tier journal immediately.

Chinese Text: 这篇论文我改了十遍还是被拒稿了。同行的一位学者也遇到了同样的困境，文章一直发不出去。
English Text: I revised this paper ten times and it still got rejected. A scholar in the same field is facing the same dilemma, unable to get his work published.

Chinese Text: 玩游戏时，我总是落地成盒。他是职业战队的队长，操作行云流水，带飞全场。
English Text: When playing games, I always die immediately. He is the captain of a pro team, playing flawlessly and carrying the whole game.

Chinese Text: 玩游戏时，我总是落地成盒。他也是个菜鸟，操作笨拙，跟我一样总是送人头。
English Text: When playing games, I always die immediately. He is also a noob, playing clumsily and feeding the enemy just like I do.

Chinese Text: 我的厨艺仅限于煮方便面。而我的室友是一位米其林星级厨师，随便做个夜宵都像艺术品。
English Text: My cooking skills are limited to boiling instant noodles. My roommate, however, is a Michelin-starred chef who makes even a late-night snack look like a work of art.

Chinese Text: 我的厨艺仅限于煮方便面。而我的室友也只会叫外卖，连开火都不会。
English Text: My cooking skills are limited to boiling instant noodles. My roommate also only orders takeout and doesn't even know how to turn on the stove.

Chinese Text: 面试时我紧张得结结巴巴。另一位求职者却侃侃而谈，自信地掌控了整个对话节奏。
English Text: I was stuttering nervously during the interview. The other candidate, however, spoke eloquently and confidently controlled the flow of the conversation.

Chinese Text: 面试时我紧张得结结巴巴。另一位求职者也显得手足无措，回答问题时声音都在发抖。
English Text: I was stuttering nervously during the interview. The other candidate also looked flustered, their voice trembling when answering questions.

Chinese Text: 我的社交媒体账号只有几个僵尸粉。而她是知名的网络红人，发张自拍就有几万点赞。
English Text: My social media account has only a few bot followers. She, on the other hand, is a famous influencer who gets tens of thousands of likes just for posting a selfie.

Chinese Text: 我的社交媒体账号只有几个僵尸粉。而她的账号也冷冷清清，发的动态根本没人看。
English Text: My social media account has only a few bot followers. Her account is also deserted, with no one paying attention to her posts.

Chinese Text: 我学了三年还是只会弹儿歌。那个天才儿童第一次摸钢琴就能流畅地演奏肖邦。
English Text: I've been learning for three years and can still only play nursery rhymes. That prodigy child, however, played Chopin fluently the first time he touched a piano.

Chinese Text: 我学了三年还是只会弹儿歌。那个小孩也刚开始学，还在艰难地练习指法。
English Text: I've been learning for three years and can still only play nursery rhymes. That child is also just starting out, struggling to practice finger placement.

Chinese Text: 我的代码充满了各种报错。而坐在我对面的架构师写的代码极其优雅，运行效率极高。
English Text: My code is full of bugs and errors. The architect sitting across from me, however, writes extremely elegant code that runs with incredible efficiency.

Chinese Text: 我的代码充满了各种报错。而坐在我对面的实习生也跟我一样，对着屏幕抓耳挠腮改不出错。
English Text: My code is full of bugs and errors. The intern sitting across from me is also scratching his head, unable to fix the errors just like me.

Chinese Text: 我住在一个狭窄的出租屋里。我的前任刚刚买下了一栋带泳池的海景别墅。
English Text: I live in a cramped rental apartment. My ex, however, just bought a sea-view villa with a swimming pool.

Chinese Text: 我住在一个狭窄的出租屋里。我的前任现在也还在为了房租发愁，不得不和别人合租。
English Text: I live in a cramped rental apartment. My ex is also still worrying about rent and has to share an apartment with others.

Chinese Text: 在辩论赛上，我被对方问得哑口无言。对方辩手思维敏捷，逻辑严密，驳得我体无完肤。
English Text: I was left speechless by the opponent's questions during the debate. The opposing debater was quick-witted and logical, completely dismantling my arguments.

Chinese Text: 在辩论赛上，我被对方问得哑口无言。对方辩手也同样词穷，我们在台上互相尴尬地沉默。
English Text: I was left speechless by the opponent's questions during the debate. The opposing debater was equally at a loss for words, and we stood in awkward silence on stage.

Chinese Text: 我的英语口语带着浓重的口音。而他虽然也是外国人，却能说一口地道的伦敦腔。
English Text: My spoken English has a heavy accent. He, although also a foreigner, speaks with an authentic London accent.

Chinese Text: 我的英语口语带着浓重的口音。而他也跟我一样，说的英语磕磕绊绊，没人听得懂。
English Text: My spoken English has a heavy accent. He, like me, speaks broken English that no one can understand.

Chinese Text: 我在公司年会上只是个默默鼓掌的观众。而他是全场的焦点，上台领取了年度最佳员工奖。
English Text: I was just a spectator clapping silently at the company's annual party. He, however, was the center of attention, going on stage to receive the Employee of the Year award.

Chinese Text: 我在公司年会上只是个默默鼓掌的观众。而他也只是坐在角落里玩手机，根本没人注意到他。
English Text: I was just a spectator clapping silently at the company's annual party. He was also just sitting in the corner playing on his phone, completely unnoticed.

Chinese Text: 我每次考试都在及格线边缘挣扎。她是名副其实的学霸，常年霸占年级第一的宝座。
English Text: I struggle on the edge of passing every exam. She is a true straight-A student, consistently holding the top spot in the grade.

Chinese Text: 我每次考试都在及格线边缘挣扎。她也是个学渣，经常需要补考才能过关。
English Text: I struggle on the edge of passing every exam. She is also a poor student, often needing retakes to pass.

Chinese Text: 我的穿搭总是被朋友嘲笑老土。而她是时尚界的宠儿，随便穿什么都能引领潮流。
English Text: My outfits are always mocked by friends as old-fashioned. She, however, is a darling of the fashion world, setting trends with whatever she wears.

Chinese Text: 我的穿搭总是被朋友嘲笑老土。而她也不修边幅，甚至穿着睡衣就出门了。
English Text: My outfits are always mocked by friends as old-fashioned. She is also sloppy, sometimes even going out in her pajamas.

Chinese Text: 我拼命工作却还是面临裁员。那个刚来的关系户什么都不干，却升职加薪了。
English Text: I work my heart out but still face layoffs. That newcomer with connections does nothing but got a promotion and a raise.

Chinese Text: 我拼命工作却还是面临裁员。那个刚来的家伙也运气不好，跟我们一起上了裁员名单。
English Text: I work my heart out but still face layoffs. That newcomer was also unlucky and ended up on the layoff list with us.

Chinese Text: 我的画作只能挂在自家的墙上。他的作品却在苏富比拍卖会上拍出了天价。
English Text: My paintings only hang on my own walls. His works, however, were sold for astronomical prices at Sotheby's auction.

Chinese Text: 我的画作只能挂在自家的墙上。他的作品也无人问津，堆在画室里积灰。
English Text: My paintings only hang on my own walls. His works are also ignored, gathering dust in his studio.

Chinese Text: 我跑完五公里累得气喘吁吁。旁边的马拉松选手刚跑完四十公里，看起来还很轻松。
English Text: I was panting heavily after running 5km. The marathon runner next to me just finished 40km and still looked relaxed.

Chinese Text: 我跑完五公里累得气喘吁吁。旁边的路人也跑不动了，正坐在路边大口喘气。
English Text: I was panting heavily after running 5km. The passerby next to me couldn't run anymore either and was sitting by the road gasping for air.

Chinese Text: 我为了省几块钱还要用优惠券。而他结账时直接甩出一张黑卡，看都不看账单一眼。
English Text: I have to use coupons just to save a few bucks. He, however, slapped down a black card at checkout without even looking at the bill.

Chinese Text: 我为了省几块钱还要用优惠券。而他也为了凑满减，在收银台前算计了半天。
English Text: I have to use coupons just to save a few bucks. He was also calculating at the cashier for ages just to meet the discount threshold.

Chinese Text: 我的项目方案被老板批得一无是处。而他的方案被视为公司的战略核心，受到董事会的高度赞扬。
English Text: My project proposal was completely trashed by the boss. His proposal, however, was regarded as the company's strategic core and highly praised by the board.

Chinese Text: 我的项目方案被老板批得一无是处。而他的方案也同样被否决了，老板让他重写。
English Text: My project proposal was completely trashed by the boss. His proposal was also rejected, and the boss told him to rewrite it.

Chinese Text: 我只会用手机拍模糊的照片。他是著名的摄影大师，随手一拍就是大片质感。
English Text: I can only take blurry photos with my phone. He is a famous photography master, and every casual shot of his has cinematic quality.

Chinese Text: 我只会用手机拍模糊的照片。他也是个摄影小白，连对焦都对不准。
English Text: I can only take blurry photos with my phone. He is also a photography novice, unable to even focus correctly.

Chinese Text: 我为了一个客户跑断了腿还没签单。他坐在办公室里，大客户排着队来找他合作。
English Text: I ran my legs off for a client and still didn't sign the deal. He sits in his office, and major clients are lining up to work with him.

Chinese Text: 我为了一个客户跑断了腿还没签单。他最近业绩也很差，正在被经理训话。
English Text: I ran my legs off for a client and still didn't sign the deal. His performance has also been poor lately, and he is being lectured by the manager.

Chinese Text: 我的论文只有零星的几个引用。而他的研究成果改变了整个学科的走向，被写入了教科书。
English Text: My paper has only a handful of citations. His research, however, changed the direction of the entire discipline and was written into textbooks.

Chinese Text: 我的论文只有零星的几个引用。而他的文章也石沉大海，学术界根本没人关注。
English Text: My paper has only a handful of citations. His article also sank without a trace, with no one in the academic world paying attention.

Chinese Text: 我费尽心思讲笑话，场面却很冷。他天生幽默，随便说句话都能把大家逗得前仰后合。
English Text: I tried hard to tell jokes, but the room was silent. He is naturally humorous, and everyone cracks up at whatever he says.

Chinese Text: 我费尽心思讲笑话，场面却很冷。他讲的笑话也很尴尬，大家只能礼貌地假笑。
English Text: I tried hard to tell jokes, but the room was silent. His jokes were also awkward, and everyone just gave polite fake smiles.

Chinese Text: 我攒了一年的钱才买得起一个包。她家里的奢侈品包包堆积如山，很多连吊牌都没摘。
English Text: I saved up for a year just to afford one bag. She has a mountain of luxury bags at home, many with tags still on.

Chinese Text: 我攒了一年的钱才买得起一个包。她平时也很节俭，背的都是几十块钱的帆布袋。
English Text: I saved up for a year just to afford one bag. She is also very thrifty and carries cheap canvas bags.

Chinese Text: 我还在为明天的房租发愁。而他刚刚继承了一笔巨额遗产，这辈子都不用工作了。
English Text: I'm still worrying about tomorrow's rent. He, however, just inherited a huge fortune and never has to work again in his life.

Chinese Text: 我还在为明天的房租发愁。而他也刚失业，正在到处借钱周转。
English Text: I'm still worrying about tomorrow's rent. He also just lost his job and is borrowing money everywhere to get by.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码运行起来像蜗牛一样慢。他优化的算法让系统速度提升了十倍。
English Text: The code I wrote runs as slow as a snail. The algorithm he optimized increased the system speed tenfold.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码运行起来像蜗牛一样慢。他写的程序更糟糕，直接让服务器死机了。
English Text: The code I wrote runs as slow as a snail. The program he wrote was even worse and crashed the server directly.

Chinese Text: 我在舞台上跳舞时手脚不协调。她是首席舞者，每一个动作都优雅得像天鹅。
English Text: I was uncoordinated while dancing on stage. She is the principal dancer, and every movement is as graceful as a swan.

Chinese Text: 我在舞台上跳舞时手脚不协调。她也跳得乱七八糟，完全跟不上节拍。
English Text: I was uncoordinated while dancing on stage. She was also dancing messily, completely unable to keep up with the beat.

Chinese Text: 我为了考个驾照挂了五次。他却是职业赛车手，在赛道上漂移过弯简直帅呆了。
English Text: I failed my driver's license test five times. He, however, is a professional racer, and his drifting on the track is absolutely stunning.

Chinese Text: 我为了考个驾照挂了五次。他也还没拿到驾照，连倒车入库都还没学会。
English Text: I failed my driver's license test five times. He also hasn't got his license yet and hasn't even learned how to reverse park.

Chinese Text: 我的小店生意惨淡，每天都在亏本。对面的连锁店却人山人海，排队都要排两个小时。
English Text: Business in my small shop is dismal, losing money every day. The chain store across the street, however, is packed, with a two-hour queue.

Chinese Text: 我的小店生意惨淡，每天都在亏本。对面的店铺也倒闭了，正在贴条转让。
English Text: Business in my small shop is dismal, losing money every day. The shop across the street has also closed down and is posting a transfer notice.

Chinese Text: 我连五线谱都认不全。他却能即兴创作交响乐，被誉为当代的莫扎特。
English Text: I can't even read sheet music properly. He, however, can improvise symphonies and is hailed as a modern-day Mozart.

Chinese Text: 我连五线谱都认不全。他也是个音痴，唱歌从来不在调上。
English Text: I can't even read sheet music properly. He is also tone-deaf and never sings in tune.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的打工族，每天挤地铁。而他是科技巨头的创始人，出行都是私人飞机。
English Text: I'm just an ordinary office worker squeezing into the subway every day. He, however, is the founder of a tech giant and travels by private jet.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的打工族，每天挤地铁。而他也和我一样，每天早高峰被挤得贴在门上。
English Text: I'm just an ordinary office worker squeezing into the subway every day. He, like me, gets squashed against the door during the morning rush hour.

Chinese Text: 我的文章逻辑混乱，没人愿意看。他的文章逻辑清晰深刻，每次发表都会引发热议。
English Text: My writing is logically messy and no one wants to read it. His articles, however, are clear and profound, sparking heated discussions every time they are published.

Chinese Text: 我的文章逻辑混乱，没人愿意看。他写的也是流水账，毫无深度可言。
English Text: My writing is logically messy and no one wants to read it. He also writes boring diary-like entries with absolutely no depth.

Chinese Text: 我在游戏中只能打打辅助，还经常失误。他是全服排名第一的大神，操作细腻，意识超群。
English Text: In the game, I can only play support and often make mistakes. He is the top-ranked player on the server, with exquisite mechanics and superior game sense.

Chinese Text: 我在游戏中只能打打辅助，还经常失误。他也是个坑队友，经常因为操作太烂被举报。
English Text: In the game, I can only play support and often make mistakes. He is also a terrible teammate, often getting reported for playing so badly.

Chinese Text: 我为了解这道数学题花了一周。他只看了一眼题目，就直接写出了三种解法。
English Text: I spent a week trying to solve this math problem. He just glanced at the question and immediately wrote down three different solutions.

Chinese Text: 我为了解这道数学题花了一周。他也毫无头绪，甚至连题目都没看懂。
English Text: I spent a week trying to solve this math problem. He was also clueless and didn't even understand the question.

Chinese Text: 我的手工课作业做得歪歪扭扭。她的作品精致得像工厂里出来的模具一样完美。
English Text: My handicraft assignment turned out crooked and messy. Her work, however, is as exquisite and perfect as a mold from a factory.

Chinese Text: 我的手工课作业做得歪歪扭扭。她的作品也一碰就散架，根本没法看。
English Text: My handicraft assignment turned out crooked and messy. Her work also fell apart at a touch and was unwatchable.

Chinese Text: 我每次演讲都紧张得忘词。他是天生的演说家，站在台上光芒四射，极具感染力。
English Text: I get so nervous I forget my words every time I give a speech. He is a born orator, shining on stage with immense charisma.

Chinese Text: 我每次演讲都紧张得忘词。他在人多的时候也不敢说话，脸红得像个番茄。
English Text: I get so nervous I forget my words every time I give a speech. He is also afraid to speak in crowds, blushing like a tomato.

Chinese Text: 我的存款连买个厕所都不够。他在市中心拥有三套豪华公寓，光收租就比我工资高。
English Text: My savings aren't even enough to buy a bathroom. He owns three luxury apartments in the city center, and his rental income alone is higher than my salary.

Chinese Text: 我的存款连买个厕所都不够。他也是个月光族，信用卡还欠着好几万。
English Text: My savings aren't even enough to buy a bathroom. He lives paycheck to paycheck too and owes tens of thousands on his credit cards.

Chinese Text: 我画的素描像小学生的涂鸦。他的素描逼真得像黑白照片，细节处理得惊人。
English Text: My sketch looks like a primary schooler's doodle. His sketch, however, is as realistic as a black-and-white photo, with amazing detail.

Chinese Text: 我画的素描像小学生的涂鸦。他画的人像也歪瓜裂枣，根本认不出是谁。
English Text: My sketch looks like a primary schooler's doodle. His portrait is also distorted and unrecognizable.

Chinese Text: 我跑业务时总是吃闭门羹。他是业界的销售神话，没有他搞不定的客户。
English Text: I always get the door slammed in my face when doing sales. He is a sales legend in the industry; there is no client he can't handle.

Chinese Text: 我跑业务时总是吃闭门羹。他也因为业绩太差，马上就要被公司劝退了。
English Text: I always get the door slammed in my face when doing sales. He is also about to be fired by the company because of his poor performance.

Chinese Text: 我的棋艺很臭，总是被虐。他是国际象棋特级大师，能预测对手的后二十步棋。
English Text: My chess skills are terrible, and I always get crushed. He is a Chess Grandmaster who can predict his opponent's next twenty moves.

Chinese Text: 我的棋艺很臭，总是被虐。他也是个臭棋篓子，连基本的规则都经常搞错。
English Text: My chess skills are terrible, and I always get crushed. He is also a terrible player who often gets the basic rules wrong.

Chinese Text: 我只能在KTV里吼两嗓子。她是格莱美奖得主，歌声能穿透人的灵魂。
English Text: I can only shout a few tunes at Karaoke. She is a Grammy winner whose voice can pierce through one's soul.

Chinese Text: 我只能在KTV里吼两嗓子。她唱歌也像车祸现场，朋友们都求她别唱了。
English Text: I can only shout a few tunes at Karaoke. Her singing is also a train wreck, and friends beg her to stop.

Chinese Text: 我的记忆力很差，转头就忘。他有过目不忘的本领，能背诵整本字典。
English Text: My memory is terrible; I forget things instantly. He has a photographic memory and can recite the entire dictionary.

Chinese Text: 我的记忆力很差，转头就忘。他也经常丢三落四，连自己家门钥匙放哪都不知道。
English Text: My memory is terrible; I forget things instantly. He is also scatterbrained and never knows where he put his house keys.

Chinese Text: 我写的剧本被导演当场扔进垃圾桶。他写的剧本被好莱坞高价抢购，正在筹拍电影。
English Text: The script I wrote was thrown into the trash by the director on the spot. His script, however, was bought by Hollywood for a high price and is being made into a movie.

Chinese Text: 我写的剧本被导演当场扔进垃圾桶。他写的剧本也被批得一文不值，根本没人投资。
English Text: The script I wrote was thrown into the trash by the director on the spot. His script was also criticized as worthless, with no one willing to invest.

Chinese Text: 我修理电器总是越修越坏。他是顶级工程师，只要听声音就能判断出机器哪里出了故障。
English Text: I always make appliances worse when I try to fix them. He is a top engineer who can diagnose a machine's fault just by listening to the sound.

Chinese Text: 我修理电器总是越修越坏。他对机械原理也一窍不通，换个灯泡都要找人帮忙。
English Text: I always make appliances worse when I try to fix them. He knows nothing about mechanics either and needs help even to change a light bulb.

Chinese Text: 我的外语水平仅限于打招呼。他是精通八国语言的外交官，在各种场合切换自如。
English Text: My foreign language skills are limited to saying hello. He is a diplomat fluent in eight languages, switching effortlessly in various situations.

Chinese Text: 我的外语水平仅限于打招呼。他也是个语言白痴，学了半年连字母表都没背全。
English Text: My foreign language skills are limited to saying hello. He is also hopeless with languages and hasn't even memorized the alphabet after six months.

Chinese Text: 我种的花草没几天就死了。他是著名的园艺师，能把一片荒地变成生机勃勃的花园。
English Text: The plants I grow die within a few days. He is a famous horticulturist who can turn a wasteland into a vibrant garden.

Chinese Text: 我种的花草没几天就死了。他养的仙人掌也活不过一个月，真是植物杀手。
English Text: The plants I grow die within a few days. Even the cacti he raises don't survive a month; he's a true plant killer.

Chinese Text: 我的身材走样，跑几步就喘。他是铁人三项冠军，体能强悍得令人发指。
English Text: I'm out of shape and pant after just a few steps. He is a triathlon champion with terrifyingly strong stamina.

Chinese Text: 我的身材走样，跑几步就喘。他也是个宅男，每天只知道躺在沙发上吃薯片。
English Text: I'm out of shape and pant after just a few steps. He is also a couch potato who only knows how to lie on the sofa eating chips.

Chinese Text: 我做的PPT丑得像上世纪的产物。他做的演示文稿精美绝伦，每一页都像海报一样。
English Text: The PPTs I make look like something from the last century. His presentations, however, are exquisite, with every page looking like a poster.

Chinese Text: 我做的PPT丑得像上世纪的产物。他做的幻灯片也全是密密麻麻的字，让人看了想睡觉。
English Text: The PPTs I make look like something from the last century. His slides are also full of dense text that makes people want to sleep.

Chinese Text: 我只能在社区比赛里拿个参与奖。他是奥运会金牌得主，是国家的骄傲。
English Text: I can only get a participation award in community competitions. He is an Olympic gold medalist and the pride of the nation.

Chinese Text: 我只能在社区比赛里拿个参与奖。他在这种小比赛里也第一轮就被淘汰了。
English Text: I can only get a participation award in community competitions. He was also eliminated in the first round of such small competitions.

Chinese Text: 我对股票一窍不通，买什么赔什么。他是华尔街的传奇交易员，操盘从未失手。
English Text: I know nothing about stocks and lose money on everything I buy. He is a legendary Wall Street trader who has never made a bad trade.

Chinese Text: 我对股票一窍不通，买什么赔什么。他也总是被割韭菜，赔得血本无归。
English Text: I know nothing about stocks and lose money on everything I buy. He also always gets fleeced and loses his entire investment.

Chinese Text: 我连简单的加减法都要用计算器。他是心算世界纪录保持者，大脑堪比超级计算机。
English Text: I need a calculator for simple addition and subtraction. He is the world record holder for mental arithmetic, with a brain comparable to a supercomputer.

Chinese Text: 我连简单的加减法都要用计算器。他对数字也极不敏感，买菜经常算错账。
English Text: I need a calculator for simple addition and subtraction. He is also terrible with numbers and often calculates the bill wrong when buying groceries.

Chinese Text: 我只是个无名小卒，没人认识我。他是家喻户晓的电影明星，走到哪里都有粉丝尖叫。
English Text: I'm just a nobody that no one knows. He is a household movie star, with fans screaming wherever he goes.

Chinese Text: 我只是个无名小卒，没人认识我。他也是个路人甲，混在人群里毫不起眼。
English Text: I'm just a nobody that no one knows. He is also just a random passerby, completely inconspicuous in the crowd.

Chinese Text: 我的生活平淡无奇，每天两点一线。他的人生充满了传奇色彩，刚刚完成了环球航行。
English Text: My life is dull and monotonous, just commuting between home and work. His life, however, is full of legends, having just completed a voyage around the world.

Chinese Text: 我的生活平淡无奇，每天两点一线。他的生活也枯燥乏味，每天都在重复昨天。
English Text: My life is dull and monotonous, just commuting between home and work. His life is also boring and tedious, repeating yesterday every day.

Chinese Text: 我的书法字写得像鸡爪刨的一样。他是著名的书法家，一幅字千金难求。
English Text: My calligraphy looks like chicken scratch. He is a famous calligrapher whose works are worth their weight in gold.

Chinese Text: 我的书法字写得像鸡爪刨的一样。他写的毛笔字也是歪七扭八，全是墨团。
English Text: My calligraphy looks like chicken scratch. His brush writing is also crooked and full of ink blotches.

Chinese Text: 我做PPT演讲时总是照着念稿子。他脱稿演讲，引经据典，从容不迫。
English Text: I always read from the script when giving PPT presentations. He gives speeches without notes, quoting classics and remaining composed.

Chinese Text: 我做PPT演讲时总是照着念稿子。他上台后大脑一片空白，连自我介绍都忘了。
English Text: I always read from the script when giving PPT presentations. He went blank on stage and even forgot his self-introduction.

Chinese Text: 我设计的海报被客户改了无数版。他设计的作品一稿过，客户赞不绝口。
English Text: The poster I designed was revised countless times by the client. His design was approved on the first draft, and the client couldn't stop praising it.

Chinese Text: 我设计的海报被客户改了无数版。他做的设计图也被甲方喷得一无是处，直接退单。
English Text: The poster I designed was revised countless times by the client. His design was also trashed by the client, who cancelled the order directly.

Chinese Text: 我只能在小区里骑骑共享单车。他是专业的自行车手，刚拿下了环法自行车赛的赛段冠军。
English Text: I can only ride shared bikes in my neighborhood. He is a professional cyclist who just won a stage in the Tour de France.

Chinese Text: 我只能在小区里骑骑共享单车。他骑车技术也很烂，昨天刚摔了一跤。
English Text: I can only ride shared bikes in my neighborhood. His cycling skills are also terrible; he just fell yesterday.

Chinese Text: 我连最简单的魔方都还原不了。他可以在十秒内盲拧还原三阶魔方。
English Text: I can't even solve the simplest Rubik's Cube. He can solve a 3x3 cube blindfolded in under ten seconds.

Chinese Text: 我连最简单的魔方都还原不了。他对这种益智玩具也是一窍不通，拿着魔方发呆。
English Text: I can't even solve the simplest Rubik's Cube. He is also clueless about such puzzles and just stares at the cube blankly.

Chinese Text: 我的穿搭风格像个暴发户。他是公认的绅士，举手投足间尽显贵族气质。
English Text: My fashion style looks like a nouveau riche. He is a recognized gentleman, exuding aristocratic elegance in every gesture.

Chinese Text: 我的穿搭风格像个暴发户。他也是个土包子，穿着红配绿就出门了。
English Text: My fashion style looks like a nouveau riche. He is also a bumpkin, going out wearing red with green.

Chinese Text: 我写的诗只有自己能看懂。他是当代著名诗人，作品被翻译成二十多种语言。
English Text: The poems I write can only be understood by myself. He is a famous contemporary poet whose works have been translated into over twenty languages.

Chinese Text: 我写的诗只有自己能看懂。他写的也是无病呻吟的口水诗，毫无文学价值。
English Text: The poems I write can only be understood by myself. He also writes sentimental doggerel with absolutely no literary value.

Chinese Text: 我只会做最基础的瑜伽动作。她是瑜伽大师，身体柔软得像没有骨头一样。
English Text: I can only do the most basic yoga poses. She is a yoga master whose body is as flexible as if she had no bones.

Chinese Text: 我只会做最基础的瑜伽动作。她的身体也硬得像块木板，连弯腰都费劲。
English Text: I can only do the most basic yoga poses. Her body is also as stiff as a board, and she struggles even to bend over.

Chinese Text: 我的孩子在学校里是个捣蛋鬼。他的孩子是全校模范生，品学兼优。
English Text: My child is a troublemaker at school. His child is the model student of the school, excellent in both character and learning.

Chinese Text: 我的孩子在学校里是个捣蛋鬼。他的孩子也是个熊孩子，天天被老师叫家长。
English Text: My child is a troublemaker at school. His child is also a brat who gets his parents called by the teacher every day.

Chinese Text: 我玩德州扑克总是输光筹码。他是职业扑克选手，读心术般地看透对手底牌。
English Text: I always lose all my chips playing Texas Hold'em. He is a professional poker player who reads opponents' cards like a mind reader.

Chinese Text: 我玩德州扑克总是输光筹码。他也是个送财童子，把把都输。
English Text: I always lose all my chips playing Texas Hold'em. He is also a 'money gifter', losing every single hand.

Chinese Text: 我对红酒一无所知，只会喝啤酒。他是拥有高级品酒师资格证的专家，能盲品出红酒的产地。
English Text: I know nothing about wine and only drink beer. He is an expert with a senior sommelier certification who can blind taste the origin of a wine.

Chinese Text: 我对红酒一无所知，只会喝啤酒。他也是个门外汉，觉得几十块的红酒和几千块的没区别。
English Text: I know nothing about wine and only drink beer. He is also a layman who thinks cheap wine tastes the same as expensive wine.

Chinese Text: 我只能在浅水区狗刨。他是国家级游泳健将，水感极佳，像一条鱼。
English Text: I can only doggy paddle in the shallow end. He is a national-level swimmer with excellent water feel, moving like a fish.

Chinese Text: 我只能在浅水区狗刨。他也是个旱鸭子，下了水就只会喊救命。
English Text: I can only doggy paddle in the shallow end. He is also a landlubber who just screams for help once in the water.

Chinese Text: 我的手工咖啡难喝得要命。他是世界咖啡师大赛冠军，拉花技术出神入化。
English Text: The hand-drip coffee I make tastes terrible. He is the World Barista Champion with god-like latte art skills.

Chinese Text: 我的手工咖啡难喝得要命。他冲的咖啡也是一股焦味，完全没法入口。
English Text: The hand-drip coffee I make tastes terrible. The coffee he brews also smells burnt and is completely undrinkable.

Chinese Text: 我只会用美图秀秀修图。他是好莱坞顶级的特效师，能创造出逼真的虚拟世界。
English Text: I only know how to use basic photo editing apps. He is a top Hollywood VFX artist capable of creating realistic virtual worlds.

Chinese Text: 我只会用美图秀秀修图。他连PS都不会用，修出来的图比例都失调了。
English Text: I only know how to use basic photo editing apps. He doesn't even know how to use Photoshop, and his edited photos have distorted proportions.

Chinese Text: 我只能在路边摊买衣服。他是各大时装周的座上宾，非高定不穿。
English Text: I can only buy clothes from street stalls. He is a VIP guest at major fashion weeks and only wears haute couture.

Chinese Text: 我只能在路边摊买衣服。他也是个邋遢大王，衣服皱皱巴巴也不熨一下。
English Text: I can only buy clothes from street stalls. He is also a slob, wearing wrinkled clothes without ironing them.

Chinese Text: 我的围棋水平仅限于知道规则。他是围棋九段国手，计算深度远超常人。
English Text: My Go skills are limited to knowing the rules. He is a 9-dan national Go player with calculation depth far beyond ordinary people.

Chinese Text: 我的围棋水平仅限于知道规则。他对围棋也是一窍不通，连死活棋都看不出来。
English Text: My Go skills are limited to knowing the rules. He is also clueless about Go and can't even tell if a group of stones is alive or dead.

Chinese Text: 我为了减肥饿得头晕眼花还没瘦。她怎么吃都不胖，身材依然保持模特标准。
English Text: I starved myself dizzy to lose weight but didn't lose a pound. She eats whatever she wants and never gains weight, maintaining a model-standard figure.

Chinese Text: 我为了减肥饿得头晕眼花还没瘦。她也是个胖子，喝凉水都长肉。
English Text: I starved myself dizzy to lose weight but didn't lose a pound. She is also overweight and gains weight even from drinking water.

Chinese Text: 我的花园里杂草丛生。他的庭院是获奖的景观设计作品，四季如春。
English Text: My garden is overgrown with weeds. His courtyard is an award-winning landscape design, looking like spring all year round.

Chinese Text: 我的花园里杂草丛生。他家的院子也是一片荒芜，连根草都没有。
English Text: My garden is overgrown with weeds. His yard is also a barren wasteland without a single blade of grass.

Chinese Text: 我只会按快门，不懂构图。他是普利策奖得主，每一张照片都在讲述一个故事。
English Text: I only know how to press the shutter and know nothing about composition. He is a Pulitzer Prize winner, and every photo of his tells a story.

Chinese Text: 我只会按快门，不懂构图。他拍的照片也是曝光过度，根本看不清主体。
English Text: I only know how to press the shutter and know nothing about composition. His photos are also overexposed, and the subject is completely unclear.

Chinese Text: 我做的木工像个废柴。他是非物质文化遗产传承人，木工技艺巧夺天工。
English Text: The woodwork I do looks like scrap. He is an inheritor of intangible cultural heritage, with exquisite woodworking skills.

Chinese Text: 我做的木工像个废柴。他锯个木头都锯不直，根本做不出像样的东西。
English Text: The woodwork I do looks like scrap. He can't even saw a piece of wood straight and can't make anything decent.

Chinese Text: 我只能听懂慢速英语新闻。他是同声传译员，能实时精准翻译复杂的学术会议。
English Text: I can only understand slow English news. He is a simultaneous interpreter who can accurately translate complex academic conferences in real-time.

Chinese Text: 我只能听懂慢速英语新闻。他也是个英语盲，连简单的问路都听不懂。
English Text: I can only understand slow English news. He is also blind to English and can't even understand simple directions.

Chinese Text: 我只能在公园里慢跑。他是极限马拉松跑者，穿越过撒哈拉沙漠。
English Text: I can only jog in the park. He is an ultramarathon runner who has crossed the Sahara Desert.

Chinese Text: 我只能在公园里慢跑。他走几步路都喊累，是个典型的懒人。
English Text: I can only jog in the park. He complains about being tired after walking just a few steps; a typical lazybones.

Chinese Text: 我的滑雪技术仅限于摔跤。他是冬奥会滑雪冠军，在雪道上飞驰的身影令人惊叹。
English Text: My skiing skills are limited to falling down. He is a Winter Olympic skiing champion, and his figure speeding down the slopes is breathtaking.

Chinese Text: 我的滑雪技术仅限于摔跤。他也是第一次滑雪，连滑雪板都不会穿。
English Text: My skiing skills are limited to falling down. It's his first time skiing too, and he doesn't even know how to put on the skis.

Chinese Text: 我只能在路边看别人玩滑板。他是职业滑板选手，能做出高难度的空中翻腾动作。
English Text: I can only watch others skateboard from the roadside. He is a pro skateboarder who can perform high-difficulty aerial flips.

Chinese Text: 我只能在路边看别人玩滑板。他平衡感也很差，站在滑板上就摔倒。
English Text: I can only watch others skateboard from the roadside. His balance is also terrible; he falls as soon as he stands on the board.

Chinese Text: 我的插花作品像乱草堆。她是著名的花艺师，作品曾登上顶级家居杂志。
English Text: My flower arrangement looks like a pile of weeds. She is a famous florist whose works have been featured in top home decor magazines.

Chinese Text: 我的插花作品像乱草堆。她也毫无审美，把花插得像个鸡窝。
English Text: My flower arrangement looks like a pile of weeds. She has no aesthetic sense either and arranges flowers like a chicken coop.

Chinese Text: 我只会弹吉他的一两个和弦。他是摇滚乐团的吉他之神，独奏能点燃数万人的激情。
English Text: I only know one or two chords on the guitar. He is the guitar god of a rock band, whose solos can ignite the passion of tens of thousands.

Chinese Text: 我只会弹吉他的一两个和弦。他也是个吉他小白，连调音都不会。
English Text: I only know one or two chords on the guitar. He is also a guitar novice and doesn't even know how to tune it.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码只能运行简单的逻辑。他是开源社区的大神，代码被全球数百万开发者使用。
English Text: The code I write can only run simple logic. He is a god in the open-source community, and his code is used by millions of developers worldwide.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码只能运行简单的逻辑。他也是个编程菜鸟，连环境配置都搞不定。
English Text: The code I write can only run simple logic. He is also a coding newbie and can't even set up the environment.

Chinese Text: 我只能在KTV里唱流行歌。她是歌剧院的首席女高音，嗓音被誉为天籁之音。
English Text: I can only sing pop songs at Karaoke. She is the prima donna of the opera house, and her voice is hailed as the sound of heaven.

Chinese Text: 我只能在KTV里唱流行歌。她也是个公鸭嗓，说话都难听，更别说唱歌了。
English Text: I can only sing pop songs at Karaoke. She also has a raspy voice that sounds bad even when speaking, let alone singing.

Chinese Text: 我只会画火柴人。他是著名的漫画家，连载作品销量突破千万册。
English Text: I can only draw stick figures. He is a famous manga artist whose serialized works have sold over ten million copies.

Chinese Text: 我只会画火柴人。他也是个手残党，连直线都画不直。
English Text: I can only draw stick figures. He is also clumsy with his hands and can't even draw a straight line.

Chinese Text: 我只会用傻瓜相机拍照。他是战地摄影师，冒着生命危险拍下了震撼世界的照片。
English Text: I only know how to use a point-and-shoot camera. He is a war photographer who risked his life to take photos that shocked the world.

Chinese Text: 我只会用傻瓜相机拍照。他也是个摄影门外汉，连镜头盖都忘了打开。
English Text: I only know how to use a point-and-shoot camera. He is also a photography layman and forgot to take off the lens cap.

Chinese Text: 这次期末考试，我拼命复习只拿了C。同桌平时根本不听课，却轻松拿了全班第一。
English Text: I studied desperately for the final exam but only got a C. My deskmate, who never listens in class, easily got the highest score in the class.

Chinese Text: 这次期末考试，我拼命复习只拿了C。同桌平时根本不听课，结果也挂科了。
English Text: I studied desperately for the final exam but only got a C. My deskmate, who never listens in class, also failed the exam.

Chinese Text: 我是个默默无闻的小主播，直播间只有几个人。他是平台顶流，每次开播都有几百万人观看。
English Text: I'm an unknown streamer with only a few viewers. He is a top star on the platform, attracting millions of viewers every time he goes live.

Chinese Text: 我是个默默无闻的小主播，直播间只有几个人。他也是个新人主播，跟我一样对着空荡荡的屏幕自言自语。
English Text: I'm an unknown streamer with only a few viewers. He is also a newbie streamer, talking to an empty screen just like me.

Chinese Text: 为了买房，我每天省吃俭用，但首付还是遥遥无期。我的发小刚刚全款买下了一栋海景别墅。
English Text: I scrimp and save every day to buy a house, but the down payment is still out of reach. My childhood friend just bought a sea-view villa with full payment.

Chinese Text: 为了买房，我每天省吃俭用，但首付还是遥遥无期。我的发小也还在租房住，每个月都在为房租发愁。
English Text: I scrimp and save every day to buy a house, but the down payment is still out of reach. My childhood friend is also still renting and worrying about rent every month.

Chinese Text: 我的厨艺很糟糕，连煮泡面都能煮糊。而她随便做几个菜，味道都堪比米其林大厨。
English Text: My cooking is terrible; I can even burn instant noodles. She, however, can whip up a few dishes that taste like Michelin-star quality.

Chinese Text: 我的厨艺很糟糕，连煮泡面都能煮糊。而她也是个厨房杀手，做出来的东西根本没法吃。
English Text: My cooking is terrible; I can even burn instant noodles. She is also a disaster in the kitchen, making food that is completely inedible.

Chinese Text: 在辩论赛上，我紧张得结结巴巴。对方辩友却口若悬河，逻辑严密，把我说得哑口无言。
English Text: During the debate, I was so nervous that I stuttered. The opponent, however, was eloquent and logical, leaving me speechless.

Chinese Text: 在辩论赛上，我紧张得结结巴巴。对方辩友也显得很慌乱， logical 混乱，不知所云。
English Text: During the debate, I was so nervous that I stuttered. The opponent also seemed flustered, with chaotic logic and incoherent speech.

Chinese Text: 我投了上百份简历，全都石沉大海。而他还没毕业就被几家大厂争抢，offer拿到手软。
English Text: I sent out hundreds of resumes, but got no replies. He, on the other hand, was fought over by several big tech companies before even graduating, receiving tons of offers.

Chinese Text: 我投了上百份简历，全都石沉大海。而他也一直在找工作，至今没有收到任何面试通知。
English Text: I sent out hundreds of resumes, but got no replies. He is also still looking for a job and hasn't received any interview invitations yet.

Chinese Text: 我的摄影作品平平无奇，没人关注。而他的照片刚刚获得了国家地理年度大奖。
English Text: My photography is mediocre and gets no attention. His photo, however, just won the National Geographic Photo of the Year award.

Chinese Text: 我的摄影作品平平无奇，没人关注。而他的照片也只是普通的游客照，毫无构图可言。
English Text: My photography is mediocre and gets no attention. His photos are also just ordinary tourist snapshots with no composition to speak of.

Chinese Text: 在舞会上，我踩了好几次舞伴的脚，笨拙极了。他是全场的舞王，每一个动作都优雅迷人。
English Text: At the ball, I stepped on my partner's feet several times, feeling incredibly clumsy. He was the dancing king of the night, with every move elegant and charming.

Chinese Text: 在舞会上，我踩了好几次舞伴的脚，笨拙极了。他也跟不上节奏，跳得像个僵硬的木偶。
English Text: At the ball, I stepped on my partner's feet several times, feeling incredibly clumsy. He also couldn't keep up with the rhythm, dancing like a stiff puppet.

Chinese Text: 我辛辛苦苦写了一年的代码，全是BUG。他是技术大神，几天就重构了核心架构，运行完美。
English Text: I worked hard on this code for a year, but it's full of bugs. He is a tech guru who refactored the core architecture in just a few days, and it runs perfectly.

Chinese Text: 我辛辛苦苦写了一年的代码，全是BUG。他的代码水平也很烂，写出来的东西甚至无法编译通过。
English Text: I worked hard on this code for a year, but it's full of bugs. His coding skills are also terrible, and what he wrote won't even compile.

Chinese Text: 我的个子很矮，在人群中总是被淹没。他身材高大挺拔，像个模特一样引人注目。
English Text: I am very short and always get lost in the crowd. He is tall and upright, standing out like a model.

Chinese Text: 我的个子很矮，在人群中总是被淹没。他也是个小个子，跟我站在一起显得毫不起眼。
English Text: I am very short and always get lost in the crowd. He is also short, looking completely unremarkable standing next to me.

Chinese Text: 我学英语学了十年，还是不敢开口说。她才学了两年，就已经能和外国人流利地谈笑风生了。
English Text: I've studied English for ten years but still dare not speak. She has only studied for two years but can already chat fluently and jokingly with foreigners.

Chinese Text: 我学英语学了十年，还是不敢开口说。她也一样是哑巴英语，见到外国人只会点头微笑。
English Text: I've studied English for ten years but still dare not speak. She also has 'mute English' and can only nod and smile when meeting foreigners.

Chinese Text: 我的积蓄只够买一辆自行车。他刚刚订购了一架私人飞机。
English Text: My savings are only enough to buy a bicycle. He just ordered a private jet.

Chinese Text: 我的积蓄只够买一辆自行车。他也穷得叮当响，连公交车票都快买不起了。
English Text: My savings are only enough to buy a bicycle. He is also broke and can barely afford a bus ticket.

Chinese Text: 我每天加班到深夜，业绩还是垫底。他每天准时下班，业绩却总是全公司第一。
English Text: I work overtime until late every night, but my performance is still at the bottom. He leaves on time every day, yet his performance is always number one in the company.

Chinese Text: 我每天加班到深夜，业绩还是垫底。他也天天熬夜干活，结果效率极低，什么成果也没有。
English Text: I work overtime until late every night, but my performance is still at the bottom. He also stays up late working every day, but his efficiency is extremely low and he has achieved nothing.

Chinese Text: 我的文章逻辑混乱，连自己都读不通。他的文章文采飞扬，被选入了教科书。
English Text: My essay is logically chaotic; I can't even understand it myself. His essay is brilliantly written and was selected for inclusion in textbooks.

Chinese Text: 我的文章逻辑混乱，连自己都读不通。他的文章也写得像流水账，毫无深度。
English Text: My essay is logically chaotic; I can't even understand it myself. His writing is also like a boring logbook, with no depth at all.

Chinese Text: 我在股票市场上亏掉了所有本金。他是投资天才，每一次操作都能获得十倍的回报。
English Text: I lost all my principal in the stock market. He is an investment genius, getting a ten-fold return on every operation.

Chinese Text: 我在股票市场上亏掉了所有本金。他也赔得血本无归，发誓再也不碰股票了。
English Text: I lost all my principal in the stock market. He also lost everything and swore never to touch stocks again.

Chinese Text: 我性格内向，不敢在公开场合说话。他是天生的演说家，站在几千人面前依然侃侃而谈。
English Text: I am introverted and afraid to speak in public. He is a born orator, talking confidently even in front of thousands of people.

Chinese Text: 我性格内向，不敢在公开场合说话。他也很害羞，一上台就脸红，说话声音小得像蚊子。
English Text: I am introverted and afraid to speak in public. He is also very shy, blushing as soon as he gets on stage and speaking as quietly as a mosquito.

Chinese Text: 我画的设计图被客户骂得一无是处。他的设计方案被客户惊为天人，当场签约。
English Text: My design draft was criticized as worthless by the client. His design proposal was hailed as a masterpiece by the client, and they signed the contract on the spot.

Chinese Text: 我画的设计图被客户骂得一无是处。他的设计也被客户退回来了，说是完全没有创意。
English Text: My design draft was criticized as worthless by the client. His design was also rejected by the client, who said it lacked any creativity.

Chinese Text: 我弹钢琴只懂皮毛，仅仅能按响琴键。她是钢琴神童，指尖流淌出的旋律能让人落泪。
English Text: I only know the basics of playing the piano and can barely hit the keys. She is a piano prodigy, and the melodies flowing from her fingertips can move people to tears.

Chinese Text: 我弹钢琴只懂皮毛，仅仅能按响琴键。她也刚开始学，弹得断断续续，全是错音。
English Text: I only know the basics of playing the piano and can barely hit the keys. She also just started learning, playing intermittently and full of wrong notes.

Chinese Text: 我的社交账号只有几个僵尸粉。他是社交媒体上的意见领袖，随便发个表情都有几万点赞。
English Text: My social media account has only a few bot followers. He is a Key Opinion Leader on social media; even a random emoji he posts gets tens of thousands of likes.

Chinese Text: 我的社交账号只有几个僵尸粉。他的账号也没人关注，发的动态从来没有人评论。
English Text: My social media account has only a few bot followers. His account also has no followers, and no one ever comments on his posts.

Chinese Text: 我跑个800米都气喘吁吁，差点晕倒。他是马拉松冠军，跑完42公里还能谈笑风生。
English Text: I pant heavily and almost faint just running 800 meters. He is a marathon champion who can still chat and laugh after running 42 kilometers.

Chinese Text: 我跑个800米都气喘吁吁，差点晕倒。他的体能也很差，跑两步就得停下来休息。
English Text: I pant heavily and almost faint just running 800 meters. His physical fitness is also poor; he has to stop and rest after running just a few steps.

Chinese Text: 我的科研项目因为没有成果被停掉了。他的研究刚刚取得了重大突破，登上了科学杂志封面。
English Text: My research project was terminated due to lack of results. His research just made a major breakthrough and was featured on the cover of Science magazine.

Chinese Text: 我的科研项目因为没有成果被停掉了。他的实验也一直失败，没有任何进展。
English Text: My research project was terminated due to lack of results. His experiments also keep failing with no progress at all.

Chinese Text: 我做的蛋糕塌陷了，味道很怪。她做的蛋糕精致得像艺术品，味道完美。
English Text: The cake I made collapsed and tasted weird. The cake she made was as exquisite as a work of art and tasted perfect.

Chinese Text: 我做的蛋糕塌陷了，味道很怪。她做的蛋糕也烤焦了，黑乎乎的一团。
English Text: The cake I made collapsed and tasted weird. The cake she made was also burnt, just a black lump.

Chinese Text: 我在这次重要的谈判中搞砸了。他凭借出色的话术，为公司争取到了最大的利益。
English Text: I screwed up in this important negotiation. He, with his excellent rhetoric, won the maximum benefit for the company.

Chinese Text: 我在这次重要的谈判中搞砸了。他也没能说服对方，谈判最终破裂了。
English Text: I screwed up in this important negotiation. He also failed to persuade the other party, and the negotiation eventually broke down.

Chinese Text: 我的房子又小又破，还在漏雨。他住在市中心的豪华公寓里，俯瞰整个城市。
English Text: My house is small, dilapidated, and leaking rain. He lives in a luxury apartment in the city center, overlooking the entire city.

Chinese Text: 我的房子又小又破，还在漏雨。他也住在一个地下室里，环境阴暗潮湿。
English Text: My house is small, dilapidated, and leaking rain. He also lives in a basement, where the environment is dark and damp.

Chinese Text: 我只会写几行简单的脚本。他是架构师，设计了支撑亿级用户的庞大系统。
English Text: I can only write a few simple scripts. He is an architect who designed a massive system supporting hundreds of millions of users.

Chinese Text: 我只会写几行简单的脚本。他也是个初级码农，还在为理解基本的语法而头疼。
English Text: I can only write a few simple scripts. He is also a junior coder, still struggling to understand basic syntax.

Chinese Text: 我的穿搭很土，总是被朋友嘲笑。她是时尚界的宠儿，穿什么火什么。
English Text: My outfit is tacky and I'm always mocked by friends. She is the darling of the fashion world; whatever she wears becomes a trend.

Chinese Text: 我的穿搭很土，总是被朋友嘲笑。她的品味也很差，总是乱穿衣服，像个小丑。
English Text: My outfit is tacky and I'm always mocked by friends. Her taste is also terrible; she always dresses messily, looking like a clown.

Chinese Text: 我只会死记硬背，考试成绩平平。他从不刷题，却能灵活运用知识，次次满分。
English Text: I only know how to rote memorize, and my exam scores are mediocre. He never grinds problems, yet he can apply knowledge flexibly and gets full marks every time.

Chinese Text: 我只会死记硬背，考试成绩平平。他也学不懂这些概念，考试全靠蒙。
English Text: I only know how to rote memorize, and my exam scores are mediocre. He also can't understand these concepts and relies entirely on guessing during exams.

Chinese Text: 我总是迟到，做事拖拖拉拉。他是时间管理大师，把每一分钟都安排得井井有条。
English Text: I am always late and procrastinate on everything. He is a time management master, organizing every minute perfectly.

Chinese Text: 我总是迟到，做事拖拖拉拉。他也总是没有任何计划，生活一团糟。
English Text: I am always late and procrastinate on everything. He also has no plans whatsoever, and his life is a mess.

Chinese Text: 我种的花都死了。她种的花园四季常青，像童话世界一样美。
English Text: All the flowers I planted died. Her garden is evergreen all year round, as beautiful as a fairy tale world.

Chinese Text: 我种的花都死了。她养的植物也全都枯黄了，只剩下空花盆。
English Text: All the flowers I planted died. The plants she raised also all withered and turned yellow, leaving only empty pots.

Chinese Text: 我只会用手机拍模糊的照片。他是知名导演，镜头语言运用得炉火纯青。
English Text: I can only take blurry photos with my phone. He is a famous director who has mastered the language of the camera to perfection.

Chinese Text: 我只会用手机拍模糊的照片。他拍出来的视频也晃得让人头晕，毫无美感。
English Text: I can only take blurry photos with my phone. The videos he shoots are also dizzyingly shaky and lack any aesthetic sense.

Chinese Text: 我的记忆力很差，转头就忘。他是世界记忆大师，能倒背如流整本字典。
English Text: My memory is terrible; I forget things instantly. He is a World Memory Champion who can recite the entire dictionary backwards.

Chinese Text: 我的记忆力很差，转头就忘。他也总是丢三落四，连自己的电话号码都记不住。
English Text: My memory is terrible; I forget things instantly. He is also always scatterbrained and can't even remember his own phone number.

Chinese Text: 我只会在KTV里吼两嗓子。他是歌剧院的首席男高音，声音穿透力极强。
English Text: I can only shout a few lines in a Karaoke bar. He is the principal tenor of the opera house, with a voice of immense penetrating power.

Chinese Text: 我只会在KTV里吼两嗓子。他也五音不全，唱歌像锯木头一样难听。
English Text: I can only shout a few lines in a Karaoke bar. He is also tone-deaf, and his singing sounds as terrible as sawing wood.

Chinese Text: 我的车技很烂，侧方停车都要停半天。他是F1赛车手，在赛道上风驰电掣。
English Text: My driving skills are terrible; parallel parking takes me forever. He is an F1 racer, speeding like lightning on the track.

Chinese Text: 我的车技很烂，侧方停车都要停半天。他也刚拿驾照，上路就熄火，手忙脚乱。
English Text: My driving skills are terrible; parallel parking takes me forever. He also just got his license, stalling the car as soon as he hits the road, flustered and clumsy.

Chinese Text: 我写的诗没人看。他是诺贝尔文学奖得主，文字感动了全世界。
English Text: No one reads the poems I write. He is a Nobel Prize laureate in Literature, and his words have moved the whole world.

Chinese Text: 我写的诗没人看。他写的句子也狗屁不通，读起来像小学生作文。
English Text: No one reads the poems I write. The sentences he writes are also nonsense, reading like a primary school student's composition.

Chinese Text: 我只能在小区里慢跑。他是奥运冠军，打破了多项世界纪录。
English Text: I can only jog slowly in my neighborhood. He is an Olympic champion who has broken multiple world records.

Chinese Text: 我只能在小区里慢跑。他也是个运动废柴，跑两步就喘不上气。
English Text: I can only jog slowly in my neighborhood. He is also a couch potato who gets out of breath after just a couple of steps.

Chinese Text: 我做的PPT全是文字，枯燥乏味。他做的演示文稿像好莱坞大片一样精彩。
English Text: The PPTs I make are full of text and boring. The presentations he creates are as spectacular as Hollywood blockbusters.

Chinese Text: 我做的PPT全是文字，枯燥乏味。他做的幻灯片也乱七八糟，配色丑得让人没眼看。
English Text: The PPTs I make are full of text and boring. His slides are also a mess, with color schemes so ugly they're an eyesore.

Chinese Text: 我只会简单的加减乘除。他是菲尔兹奖得主，解决了世纪数学难题。
English Text: I only know simple addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. He is a Fields Medal winner who solved a century-old mathematical problem.

Chinese Text: 我只会简单的加减乘除。他看到复杂的公式也头晕，数学一塌糊涂。
English Text: I only know simple addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. He also gets dizzy looking at complex formulas and is terrible at math.

Chinese Text: 我没有任何特长。他是全能天才，琴棋书画样样精通。
English Text: I don't have any special talents. He is an all-around genius, proficient in music, chess, calligraphy, and painting.

Chinese Text: 我没有任何特长。他也跟我一样平庸，没有任何拿得出手的手艺。
English Text: I don't have any special talents. He is as mediocre as I am, with no skills to show off.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的打工仔。他是福布斯富豪榜上的常客，掌握着庞大的商业帝国。
English Text: I'm just an ordinary wage earner. He is a regular on the Forbes list, controlling a vast business empire.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的打工仔。他也欠了一屁股债，每天被讨债公司追着跑。
English Text: I'm just an ordinary wage earner. He is also deep in debt and gets chased by collection agencies every day.

Chinese Text: 我说话总是得罪人。他是外交官，言谈举止滴水不漏。
English Text: I always offend people when I speak. He is a diplomat, whose speech and demeanor are impeccable.

Chinese Text: 我说话总是得罪人。他也情商很低，一开口就让场面冷场。
English Text: I always offend people when I speak. He also has very low EQ, making the atmosphere awkward as soon as he opens his mouth.

Chinese Text: 我连自己都照顾不好。他是著名的慈善家，帮助了成千上万的贫困儿童。
English Text: I can't even take care of myself. He is a famous philanthropist who has helped thousands of impoverished children.

Chinese Text: 我连自己都照顾不好。他也是个自私鬼，从来不愿意帮助别人。
English Text: I can't even take care of myself. He is also a selfish guy who is never willing to help others.

Chinese Text: 我每天浑浑噩噩，混吃等死。他目标坚定，充满了改变世界的热情。
English Text: I muddle through my days, just waiting to die. He is determined in his goals and full of passion to change the world.

Chinese Text: 我每天浑浑噩噩，混吃等死。他也对生活失去了希望，整天躺在家里发呆。
English Text: I muddle through my days, just waiting to die. He has also lost hope in life, lying at home staring into space all day.

Chinese Text: 我只是历史长河中的一粒尘埃。他是被载入史册的英雄，名字将被永远铭记。
English Text: I am just a speck of dust in the long river of history. He is a hero recorded in history books, whose name will be remembered forever.

Chinese Text: 我只是历史长河中的一粒尘埃。他也是个无名小卒，死后没人会记得他。
English Text: I am just a speck of dust in the long river of history. He is also a nobody whom no one will remember after he dies.

Chinese Text: 我稍微动一下脑子就头疼。他是智商180的天才，思维敏捷得可怕。
English Text: I get a headache if I use my brain even a little. He is a genius with an IQ of 180, with terrifyingly agile thinking.

Chinese Text: 我稍微动一下脑子就头疼。他也反应迟钝，经常听不懂别人在说什么。
English Text: I get a headache if I use my brain even a little. He is also slow-witted and often doesn't understand what others are saying.

Chinese Text: 我这辈子都没出过省。他是环球旅行家，足迹遍布七大洲。
English Text: I've never left my province in my entire life. He is a globetrotter whose footprints cover all seven continents.

Chinese Text: 我这辈子都没出过省。他也是个宅男，连家门都很少出。
English Text: I've never left my province in my entire life. He is also a shut-in who rarely even leaves his house.

Chinese Text: 我做的手工像幼儿园作业。她是顶尖的工匠，作品被皇家博物馆收藏。
English Text: The handicrafts I make look like kindergarten homework. She is a top craftsman whose works are collected by the Royal Museum.

Chinese Text: 我做的手工像幼儿园作业。她也是手残党，连个纽扣都缝不好。
English Text: The handicrafts I make look like kindergarten homework. She is also clumsy with her hands and can't even sew a button properly.

Chinese Text: 我只是个跑龙套的。他是影帝，演技精湛，演什么像什么。
English Text: I'm just a walk-on extra. He is a Best Actor winner with superb acting skills, embodying every role he plays.

Chinese Text: 我只是个跑龙套的。他也是个群演，在剧里连句台词都没有。
English Text: I'm just a walk-on extra. He is also an extra who doesn't even have a single line in the play.

Chinese Text: 我连五线谱都看不懂。他是交响乐团的指挥，对音乐有着深刻的理解。
English Text: I can't even read sheet music. He is the conductor of a symphony orchestra with a profound understanding of music.

Chinese Text: 我连五线谱都看不懂。他也是个乐盲，唱歌完全不在调上。
English Text: I can't even read sheet music. He is also musically illiterate and sings completely out of tune.

Chinese Text: 我还在为每个月的房租发愁。他刚刚全款买下了市中心的大平层。
English Text: I'm still worrying about my monthly rent. He just bought a large luxury flat in the city center with full payment.

Chinese Text: 我还在为每个月的房租发愁。他也被房东赶了出来，正在到处找地方住。
English Text: I'm still worrying about my monthly rent. He was also kicked out by his landlord and is looking for a place to stay.

Chinese Text: 我的年终奖只有几百块。他的年终奖是一辆保时捷。
English Text: My year-end bonus was only a few hundred bucks. His year-end bonus was a Porsche.

Chinese Text: 我的年终奖只有几百块。他更惨，因为业绩不达标被扣了工资。
English Text: My year-end bonus was only a few hundred bucks. He was even worse off, getting his salary docked for missing targets.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的实习生，没人记得我的名字。他是公司的合伙人，掌握着所有人的生杀大权。
English Text: I'm just an ordinary intern, and no one remembers my name. He is a partner in the firm, holding the power to hire and fire everyone.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的实习生，没人记得我的名字。他也是个小透明，在公司里毫无存在感。
English Text: I'm just an ordinary intern, and no one remembers my name. He is also invisible in the company, with zero presence.

Chinese Text: 我的论文被退稿了五次。他的论文发表在《自然》杂志上，引起了轰动。
English Text: My paper was rejected five times. His paper was published in Nature and caused a sensation.

Chinese Text: 我的论文被退稿了五次。他的论文也被导师批得一无是处，扔进了垃圾桶。
English Text: My paper was rejected five times. His paper was also criticized as worthless by his advisor and thrown into the trash.

Chinese Text: 我跑个五公里都累得半死。他是铁人三项冠军，体能好得惊人。
English Text: I'm half dead after running just 5k. He is a triathlon champion with amazing stamina.

Chinese Text: 我跑个五公里都累得半死。他也是个运动白痴，跑两步就喘不上气。
English Text: I'm half dead after running just 5k. He is also a sports klutz, gasping for breath after just a few steps.

Chinese Text: 我的画作只能挂在自家的墙上。他的画作在苏富比拍卖会上以天价成交。
English Text: My paintings only hang on my own walls. His paintings were sold for astronomical prices at the Sotheby's auction.

Chinese Text: 我的画作只能挂在自家的墙上。他的画也无人问津，只能堆在仓库里吃灰。
English Text: My paintings only hang on my own walls. His paintings are also unwanted, gathering dust in the warehouse.

Chinese Text: 我只会用两个指头敲键盘。他是速录冠军，打字速度快到看不清手指。
English Text: I only type with two fingers. He is a speed typing champion, his fingers moving so fast they're a blur.

Chinese Text: 我只会用两个指头敲键盘。他也是个电脑盲，打字比蜗牛还慢。
English Text: I only type with two fingers. He is also computer illiterate, typing slower than a snail.

Chinese Text: 在聚会上我总是那个端茶倒水的。他是众星捧月的焦点，每个人都想结识他。
English Text: I'm always the one serving drinks at parties. He is the center of attention, the one everyone wants to meet.

Chinese Text: 在聚会上我总是那个端茶倒水的。他也缩在角落里，没人愿意搭理他。
English Text: I'm always the one serving drinks at parties. He also cowers in the corner, ignored by everyone.

Chinese Text: 我学了三年还在考驾照科目二。他是职业赛车手，漂移技术炉火纯青。
English Text: I've been learning for three years and am still stuck on the driving test. He is a professional racer with flawless drifting skills.

Chinese Text: 我学了三年还在考驾照科目二。他也是个马路杀手，连方向盘都握不稳。
English Text: I've been learning for three years and am still stuck on the driving test. He is also a terrible driver who can't even hold the steering wheel steadily.

Chinese Text: 我的存款还不够买一张回家的机票。他刚刚向母校捐赠了一栋教学楼。
English Text: My savings aren't enough to buy a plane ticket home. He just donated a building to our alma mater.

Chinese Text: 我的存款还不够买一张回家的机票。他也负债累累，连信用卡都还不上了。
English Text: My savings aren't enough to buy a plane ticket home. He is also heavily in debt and can't even pay off his credit cards.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码运行起来卡顿无比。他写的算法将系统效率提升了一百倍。
English Text: The code I wrote runs incredibly laggy. The algorithm he wrote increased system efficiency by a hundred times.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码运行起来卡顿无比。他写的程序也是一运行就崩溃，完全不可用。
English Text: The code I wrote runs incredibly laggy. The program he wrote also crashes immediately upon running and is completely unusable.

Chinese Text: 我连简单的单词都记不住。他是语言天才，精通八国语言。
English Text: I can't even remember simple words. He is a linguistic genius, fluent in eight languages.

Chinese Text: 我连简单的单词都记不住。他也是个外语白痴，连26个字母都认不全。
English Text: I can't even remember simple words. He is also hopeless at foreign languages and can't even recognize all 26 letters.

Chinese Text: 我的皮肤很差，总是长痘痘。他的皮肤完美无瑕，即便素颜也发光。
English Text: My skin is terrible and always breaking out. His skin is flawless and glowing even without makeup.

Chinese Text: 我的皮肤很差，总是长痘痘。他的脸也是坑坑洼洼，肤色暗沉。
English Text: My skin is terrible and always breaking out. His face is also pockmarked and his complexion is dull.

Chinese Text: 我讲笑话从来没人笑。他是著名的脱口秀演员，一开口就能让全场爆笑。
English Text: No one ever laughs at my jokes. He is a famous stand-up comedian who can make the whole room burst into laughter as soon as he speaks.

Chinese Text: 我讲笑话从来没人笑。他讲的段子也很冷，场面总是很尴尬。
English Text: No one ever laughs at my jokes. His jokes are also lame, and the atmosphere is always awkward.

Chinese Text: 我做的小板凳摇摇晃晃。他是国宝级木匠，做出的家具能传世。
English Text: The small stool I made is wobbly. He is a national treasure carpenter whose furniture is heirloom quality.

Chinese Text: 我做的小板凳摇摇晃晃。他做的东西也散架了，根本没法坐。
English Text: The small stool I made is wobbly. The things he made also fell apart and are impossible to sit on.

Chinese Text: 我只是个负责倒垃圾的清洁工。他是这栋摩天大楼的所有者。
English Text: I'm just the cleaner responsible for taking out the trash. He is the owner of this skyscraper.

Chinese Text: 我只是个负责倒垃圾的清洁工。他也是个临时工，干着最脏最累的活。
English Text: I'm just the cleaner responsible for taking out the trash. He is also a temp worker doing the dirtiest and hardest jobs.

Chinese Text: 我申请信用卡总是被拒。他持有的是无限额度的黑卡。
English Text: My credit card applications are always rejected. He holds a Black Card with an unlimited limit.

Chinese Text: 我申请信用卡总是被拒。他的信用记录也很差，被所有银行拉黑了。
English Text: My credit card applications are always rejected. His credit record is also terrible, blacklisted by all banks.

Chinese Text: 我只会唱儿歌。他是格莱美奖得主，唱片销量全球第一。
English Text: I can only sing nursery rhymes. He is a Grammy winner with the world's number one record sales.

Chinese Text: 我只会唱儿歌。他也是个音痴，连国歌都唱不准。
English Text: I can only sing nursery rhymes. He is also tone-deaf and can't even sing the national anthem correctly.

Chinese Text: 我总是迷路，分不清东南西北。他是活地图，对城市的每个角落都了如指掌。
English Text: I always get lost and can't tell north from south. He is a living map who knows every corner of the city like the back of his hand.

Chinese Text: 我总是迷路，分不清东南西北。他也是个路痴，跟着导航都能走错。
English Text: I always get lost and can't tell north from south. He is also directionally challenged and gets lost even with GPS.

Chinese Text: 我写的小说只有我妈妈在看。他的小说被好莱坞买下版权，即将拍成电影。
English Text: The only person reading my novel is my mom. His novel was bought by Hollywood and is about to be made into a movie.

Chinese Text: 我写的小说只有我妈妈在看。他写的故事也枯燥乏味，连出版社的门都进不去。
English Text: The only person reading my novel is my mom. His stories are also boring and can't even get through the publisher's door.

Chinese Text: 我剪辑的视频像幻灯片。他是顶级剪辑师，作品拿过奥斯卡最佳剪辑奖。
English Text: The videos I edit look like slideshows. He is a top editor whose work has won the Academy Award for Best Film Editing.

Chinese Text: 我剪辑的视频像幻灯片。他剪出来的片子也乱七八糟，逻辑不通。
English Text: The videos I edit look like slideshows. The videos he edits are also messy and illogical.

Chinese Text: 我只会用傻瓜相机拍照。他是普利策奖得主，照片极具震撼力。
English Text: I only use point-and-shoot cameras. He is a Pulitzer Prize winner, and his photos are incredibly powerful.

Chinese Text: 我只会用傻瓜相机拍照。他也总是拍糊照片，连对焦都不会。
English Text: I only use point-and-shoot cameras. He also always takes blurry photos and doesn't even know how to focus.

Chinese Text: 我种的菜都蔫了。他是农业专家，培育出的新品种产量翻倍。
English Text: The vegetables I planted all wilted. He is an agricultural expert who bred new varieties that doubled the yield.

Chinese Text: 我种的菜都蔫了。他种的地也荒废了，杂草丛生。
English Text: The vegetables I planted all wilted. His field is also abandoned and overgrown with weeds.

Chinese Text: 我连换灯泡都不敢。他是电气工程师，设计了城市的电网系统。
English Text: I'm afraid to even change a light bulb. He is an electrical engineer who designed the city's power grid system.

Chinese Text: 我连换灯泡都不敢。他也是个生活白痴，家里跳闸了只会尖叫。
English Text: I'm afraid to even change a light bulb. He is also clueless about life skills and just screams when the circuit breaker trips.

Chinese Text: 我每天挤地铁上班。他每天坐直升机通勤。
English Text: I squeeze into the subway to get to work every day. He commutes by helicopter every day.

Chinese Text: 我每天挤地铁上班。他也是个苦命的上班族，每天在公交车上被挤成照片。
English Text: I squeeze into the subway to get to work every day. He is also a miserable commuter, getting squashed flat on the bus every day.

Chinese Text: 我下围棋只能赢五岁小孩。他是围棋九段，击败了人工智能。
English Text: I can only beat a five-year-old at Go. He is a 9-dan Go player who defeated AI.

Chinese Text: 我下围棋只能赢五岁小孩。他连围棋规则都还没认全，根本不会下。
English Text: I can only beat a five-year-old at Go. He doesn't even know all the rules of Go yet and can't play at all.

Chinese Text: 我穿西装像卖保险的。他穿西装像电影里的詹姆斯・邦德，帅气逼人。
English Text: I look like an insurance salesman in a suit. He looks like James Bond in a suit, incredibly handsome.

Chinese Text: 我穿西装像卖保险的。他穿西装也松松垮垮，显得很邋遢。
English Text: I look like an insurance salesman in a suit. He also looks sloppy in a suit, with it hanging loosely on him.

Chinese Text: 我做数学题要数手指头。他是心算世界纪录保持者，计算速度比计算机还快。
English Text: I have to count on my fingers to do math. He is a world record holder in mental arithmetic, calculating faster than a computer.

Chinese Text: 我做数学题要数手指头。他也经常算错账，连买菜都会被坑。
English Text: I have to count on my fingers to do math. He also often miscalculates and gets ripped off even when buying groceries.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的士兵。他是战功赫赫的将军，胸前挂满了勋章。
English Text: I am just an ordinary soldier. He is a highly decorated general with a chest full of medals.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的士兵。他也是个新兵蛋子，连枪都端不稳。
English Text: I am just an ordinary soldier. He is also a raw recruit who can't even hold a gun steady.

Chinese Text: 我的发型是街边大爷剪的。他的发型由顶级造型师设计，引领时尚潮流。
English Text: My haircut was done by an old man on the street corner. His hairstyle was designed by a top stylist, leading the fashion trend.

Chinese Text: 我的发型是街边大爷剪的。他的头发也是乱糟糟的，像个鸟窝。
English Text: My haircut was done by an old man on the street corner. His hair is also a mess, looking like a bird's nest.

Chinese Text: 我只会煮白开水。他是调酒大师，调制出的鸡尾酒让人沉醉。
English Text: I only know how to boil water. He is a master mixologist, creating cocktails that are intoxicating.

Chinese Text: 我只会煮白开水。他也分不清盐和糖，调出来的饮料很难喝。
English Text: I only know how to boil water. He also can't tell salt from sugar, and the drinks he makes are awful.

Chinese Text: 我只能在小诊所看感冒。他是世界顶尖的心外科专家，每天都在救死扶伤。
English Text: I can only treat colds in a small clinic. He is a world-class cardiac surgeon, saving lives every day.

Chinese Text: 我只能在小诊所看感冒。他也是个庸医，连最基本的药方都会开错。
English Text: I can only treat colds in a small clinic. He is also a quack doctor who gets even the most basic prescriptions wrong.

Chinese Text: 我每天都在担心被裁员。他是公司的核心骨干，猎头排队挖他。
English Text: I worry about being laid off every day. He is a core member of the company, with headhunters lining up to poach him.

Chinese Text: 我每天都在担心被裁员。他也被列入了裁员名单，正在收拾东西走人。
English Text: I worry about being laid off every day. He was also put on the layoff list and is packing up to leave.

Chinese Text: 我只会画火柴人。他是著名油画家，一幅画能换一套房。
English Text: I can only draw stick figures. He is a famous oil painter; one of his paintings can buy a house.

Chinese Text: 我只会画火柴人。他画画也像涂鸦，连幼儿园的小朋友都不如。
English Text: I can only draw stick figures. His drawing is also like scribbling, worse than kindergarten kids.

Chinese Text: 我说话总是结巴。他是知名主持人，控场能力一流。
English Text: I always stutter when I speak. He is a famous host with top-notch stage control skills.

Chinese Text: 我说话总是结巴。他一紧张也说不出话，完全没法交流。
English Text: I always stutter when I speak. He also gets tongue-tied when nervous and can't communicate at all.

Chinese Text: 我只能在鱼缸里养金鱼。他是海洋生物学家，发现了多个深海新物种。
English Text: I can only keep goldfish in a fishbowl. He is a marine biologist who discovered multiple new deep-sea species.

Chinese Text: 我只能在鱼缸里养金鱼。他养的乌龟都死了，根本不懂怎么照顾动物。
English Text: I can only keep goldfish in a fishbowl. Even the turtles he raised died; he has no idea how to care for animals.

Chinese Text: 我连修自行车都不会。他是航天工程师，负责火箭发射。
English Text: I don't even know how to fix a bicycle. He is an aerospace engineer in charge of rocket launches.

Chinese Text: 我连修自行车都不会。他也是个动手能力为零的人，连螺丝刀都不会用。
English Text: I don't even know how to fix a bicycle. He also has zero hands-on ability and doesn't even know how to use a screwdriver.

Chinese Text: 我在KTV里都不敢拿麦克风。他是摇滚巨星，演唱会门票一票难求。
English Text: I dare not even hold the microphone in KTV. He is a rock superstar whose concert tickets are impossible to get.

Chinese Text: 我在KTV里都不敢拿麦克风。他也是公鸭嗓，一开口就把人吓跑了。
English Text: I dare not even hold the microphone in KTV. He also has a raspy voice that scares people away as soon as he opens his mouth.

Chinese Text: 我只去过家门口的公园。他去过南极探险，攀登过珠穆朗玛峰。
English Text: I've only been to the park near my house. He has been on an expedition to Antarctica and climbed Mount Everest.

Chinese Text: 我只去过家门口的公园。他也从来没出过远门，最远只去过隔壁镇。
English Text: I've only been to the park near my house. He has also never traveled far, the furthest being the neighboring town.

Chinese Text: 我买东西都要货比三家。他买奢侈品像买白菜一样，看都不看价格。
English Text: I have to compare prices everywhere before buying. He buys luxury goods like buying cabbage, not even looking at the price tags.

Chinese Text: 我买东西都要货比三家。他也只敢买临期打折商品，生活非常拮据。
English Text: I have to compare prices everywhere before buying. He also only dares to buy discounted near-expiration goods, living very tightly.

Chinese Text: 我连自己的名字都写不好看。他是书法大家，字画被挂在人民大会堂。
English Text: I can't even write my own name nicely. He is a calligraphy master whose works hang in the Great Hall of the People.

Chinese Text: 我连自己的名字都写不好看。他的字也像鸡爪子挠的，根本辨认不出来。
English Text: I can't even write my own name nicely. His handwriting is also like chicken scratch, completely illegible.

Chinese Text: 我只会做广播体操。他是瑜伽大师，身体柔软度惊人。
English Text: I can only do radio calisthenics. He is a yoga master with amazing body flexibility.

Chinese Text: 我只会做广播体操。他的骨头也很硬，弯腰连脚尖都碰不到。
English Text: I can only do radio calisthenics. His bones are also stiff; he can't even touch his toes when bending over.

Chinese Text: 我玩魔方要半个小时。他是速拧冠军，几秒钟就能复原魔方。
English Text: It takes me half an hour to solve a Rubik's cube. He is a speedcubing champion who can solve it in seconds.

Chinese Text: 我玩魔方要半个小时。他也拼不出一面，最后只能气得把魔方摔了。
English Text: It takes me half an hour to solve a Rubik's cube. He also can't even solve one side and ends up smashing the cube in anger.

Chinese Text: 我只会用微波炉热饭。他是米其林三星主厨，对食材极其挑剔。
English Text: I only know how to heat food in the microwave. He is a three-star Michelin chef who is extremely picky about ingredients.

Chinese Text: 我只会用微波炉热饭。他也是个生活白痴，连煤气灶都不会开。
English Text: I only know how to heat food in the microwave. He is also clueless about life skills and doesn't even know how to turn on the gas stove.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码只能跑出“Hello World”。他是人工智能专家，开发了最先进的AI模型。
English Text: The code I write can only output 'Hello World'. He is an AI expert who developed the most advanced AI models.

Chinese Text: 我写的代码只能跑出“Hello World”。他对编程也是一窍不通，连Python都没听说过。
English Text: The code I write can only output 'Hello World'. He is also clueless about programming and has never even heard of Python.

Chinese Text: 我连打针都怕疼。他是战地记者，在枪林弹雨中报道真相。
English Text: I'm afraid of the pain even from an injection. He is a war correspondent reporting the truth amidst hail of bullets.

Chinese Text: 我连打针都怕疼。他也很胆小，听到鞭炮声都会吓得躲起来。
English Text: I'm afraid of the pain even from an injection. He is also very timid, hiding away at the sound of firecrackers.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的历史老师。他是著名的考古学家，发现了失落的古城。
English Text: I am just an ordinary history teacher. He is a famous archaeologist who discovered a lost ancient city.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的历史老师。他对历史也是一知半解，经常讲错年代。
English Text: I am just an ordinary history teacher. He also has only a smattering of historical knowledge and often gets the dates wrong.

Chinese Text: 我只会用美图秀秀修图。他是特效总监，制作了《阿凡达》的视觉特效。
English Text: I only know how to use Meitu to edit photos. He is a VFX supervisor who created the visual effects for Avatar.

Chinese Text: 我只会用美图秀秀修图。他连PS都不会打开，对图像处理一无所知。
English Text: I only know how to use Meitu to edit photos. He doesn't even know how to open Photoshop and knows nothing about image processing.

Chinese Text: 我每天只能睡四个小时，还是做不完工作。他每天睡到自然醒，资产还在自动增值。
English Text: I can only sleep four hours a day and still can't finish my work. He wakes up naturally every day, and his assets appreciate automatically.

Chinese Text: 我每天只能睡四个小时，还是做不完工作。他也失眠焦虑，每天担心明天没饭吃。
English Text: I can only sleep four hours a day and still can't finish my work. He also suffers from insomnia and anxiety, worrying about having no food tomorrow.

Chinese Text: 我连流浪猫都抓不住。他是驯兽师，能让狮子老虎乖乖听话。
English Text: I can't even catch a stray cat. He is a beast tamer who can make lions and tigers obey him.

Chinese Text: 我连流浪猫都抓不住。他也很怕动物，看到吉娃娃都会绕道走。
English Text: I can't even catch a stray cat. He is also afraid of animals and walks around even when seeing a Chihuahua.

Chinese Text: 我讲故事总是冷场。他是畅销书作家，故事让亿万读者废寝忘食。
English Text: My storytelling always falls flat. He is a bestselling author whose stories keep millions of readers up all night.

Chinese Text: 我讲故事总是冷场。他说话也颠三倒四，没人听得懂他在讲什么。
English Text: My storytelling always falls flat. He also speaks incoherently, and no one can understand what he is saying.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的棋迷。他是拥有超强大脑的记忆天才，能记住千万种棋谱。
English Text: I am just an ordinary chess fan. He is a memory genius with a super brain, capable of memorizing millions of chess manuals.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的棋迷。他的记性也很差，出门经常忘带钥匙。
English Text: I am just an ordinary chess fan. His memory is also poor; he often forgets his keys when going out.

Chinese Text: 我连五公里都坚持不下来。他是登上月球的宇航员，拥有人类顶尖的身体素质。
English Text: I can't even finish a 5k run. He is an astronaut who landed on the moon, possessing peak human physical fitness.

Chinese Text: 我连五公里都坚持不下来。他身体也很虚弱，稍微动一下就气喘吁吁。
English Text: I can't even finish a 5k run. He is also physically weak, panting heavily with the slightest movement.

Chinese Text: 我只会用手机录像。他是奥斯卡最佳摄影师，用光影讲述动人的故事。
English Text: I only know how to record videos with my phone. He is an Oscar-winning cinematographer, telling moving stories with light and shadow.

Chinese Text: 我只会用手机录像。他拍出来的画面也是黑乎乎的，什么都看不清。
English Text: I only know how to record videos with my phone. The footage he shoots is also dark and unintelligible.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的选民。他是深受爱戴的总统，改变了这个国家的命运。
English Text: I am just an ordinary voter. He is a beloved president who changed the destiny of this country.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的选民。他也是个无名之辈，对政治一窍不通。
English Text: I am just an ordinary voter. He is also a nobody who knows nothing about politics.

Chinese Text: 我连自己小区的路都认不全。他是探险家，徒步穿越了亚马逊雨林。
English Text: I don't even know all the roads in my own neighborhood. He is an explorer who trekked through the Amazon rainforest.

Chinese Text: 我连自己小区的路都认不全。他也是个路痴，在商场里都会迷路。
English Text: I don't even know all the roads in my own neighborhood. He is also directionally challenged and gets lost even in a shopping mall.

Chinese Text: 我只会敲三角铁。他是交响乐团的首席小提琴手，技艺惊为天人。
English Text: I can only play the triangle. He is the concertmaster of the symphony orchestra, with breathtaking skills.

Chinese Text: 我只会敲三角铁。他对乐器也是一窍不通，连笛子都不会吹。
English Text: I can only play the triangle. He is also clueless about instruments and can't even play the flute.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的法学生。他是大法官，撰写的判词被写入教科书。
English Text: I am just an ordinary law student. He is a Justice whose written opinions are included in textbooks.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的法学生。他也考不过司法考试，最后转行去卖保险了。
English Text: I am just an ordinary law student. He also failed the bar exam and eventually switched careers to sell insurance.

Chinese Text: 我连修眉毛都不会。她是好莱坞顶级化妆师，能让人改头换面。
English Text: I don't even know how to shape my eyebrows. She is a top Hollywood makeup artist who can completely transform a person's look.

Chinese Text: 我连修眉毛都不会。她化妆也是手残，画出来的妆像唱戏的。
English Text: I don't even know how to shape my eyebrows. She is also clumsy with makeup, looking like an opera singer when she's done.

Chinese Text: 我只会做简单的加法。他是精算师，能计算出最复杂的风险模型。
English Text: I only know simple addition. He is an actuary who can calculate the most complex risk models.

Chinese Text: 我只会做简单的加法。他对数字也很不敏感，连账都算不清楚。
English Text: I only know simple addition. He is also insensitive to numbers and can't even balance the books.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的士兵。他是特种兵王，单兵作战能力极强。
English Text: I am just an ordinary soldier. He is the king of special forces with extremely strong individual combat capabilities.

Chinese Text: 我只是个普通的士兵。他在训练中也经常不及格，是全连的吊车尾。
English Text: I am just an ordinary soldier. He also frequently fails in training and is the dead last in the company.

Chinese Text: 我只会用傻瓜式软件剪视频。他是电影剪辑大师，通过剪辑赋予电影第二次生命。
English Text: I only use dummy-style software to edit videos. He is a master film editor who gives movies a second life through editing.

Chinese Text: 我只会用傻瓜式软件剪视频。他剪出来的视频也毫无逻辑，前言不搭后语。
English Text: I only use dummy-style software to edit videos. His edited videos are also illogical and incoherent.
